root.name: Arcade Essentials
root.description: Play a collection of 5 "Arcade Classics" that have been reinvented for a modern generation. The five games included are: InterceptorInterceptor( Space Invaders clone) Terra Conqueror Terra Conqueror ( QIX clone) Color Cells Color Cells ( Puzzle Bobble clone) Troops Attack Troops Attack( Missile Command/ Sabotage clone) Hexagonum Hexagonum( Q*bert clone)
